Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Northbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Irving Park
ShortDescription: Northbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Cicero, Montrose, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Cicero, Montrose, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Irving Park.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Cottage Grove.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
